sitename: Beautiful Boho - Crystal Healing Jewellery, Essential Oils and Workshops
cleaned_text: This Collection of healing stones has carefully been put together to work toward boosting your immune system. The collection includes: Unakite: To heal the body and let go of feelings that no longer serve us Bloodstone: To boost the immune system Howlite: To ease feelings of stress and anxiety Rose Quartz: To give feelings of unconditional love to raise your vibrations A crystal holder to wear your chosen crystals as a 18 inch necklace or keying and a 'Guide to using crystals' Booklet This collection has been made with Love & Blessings especailly for the wearer
